description:
Drake is best bud and wingman for Gram
He's a few years older than Gram, and there is a bit more maturity to him. Though you can tell he loves partying and playing the field. The two of them make a potent team in the clubs.
He's a fun guy too, and you can tell he likes to laugh.
And what a big dick on this guy too! It is a big uncut hose for sure.
He's got some body hair action that I had asked him to grow out a bit, and I think it suits him.
An explosive cumshot, so it is worth not missing!
title: Drake - Solo
